definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: So as we wash feet today, let us be "washed" by the Lord's attitude of loving service.
sentences.chinese: 當我們今天洗腳時，讓我們被服事的愛來洗滌。

sentences.english: This is usually also the time for tackling the difficult problem of getting food supplies, bedding, clothing, etc.
sentences.chinese: 解決給養被服等困難問題，也往往在這個時候。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the influence factors acted on germicidal efficacy of a bed unit ozone sterilizer.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究臭氧被服消毒機消毒效果的影響因素。

sentences.english: Objective To observe germicidal efficacy and disinfection-related properties of the microwave clothing disinfector.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察微波被服消毒機殺菌效果及消毒相關性能。

sentences.english: As the wine, Wan and clothing.
sentences.chinese: 不如飲美酒，被服紈與素。

definition: cloth and silk/cotton and silk textiles
